article.title: Intevac Photonics to Provide Electronic Image Intensifier
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Intevac Photonics Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., was awarded a firm-fixed-price contract with a maximum value of $27,035,593 for the procurement of electronic image intensifier ship sets and related services. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
